message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 39
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
39 
W3C TIME USE CASES: SCHEDULING 
Suppose someone has a telecon scheduled for 6:00pm EST (Eastern Standard Time) on November 5, 2006. 
You would like to make an appointment with him for 2:00pm PST (Pacific Standard Time) on the same day, 
and expect the meeting to last 45 minutes.  Will there be an overlap? 
http://www.tagoror.com/enciclopedia/es/media/4/4b/timezones.png 
Hobbs JR, Feng P (eds) (2006) Time Ontologies in OWL. W3C Working Draft 2. 
http://www.w3.org/TR/owl-time/
speaker: SYSTEM
